snippet.title: Apple II Longplay - ABM (1980) by Muse Software
snippet.description:
Full playthrough of the game ABM for Apple II computers. Game developed by Muse Software in 1980.

The game is pretty decent Missile Defense clone with colorful graphics, good sound and sampled speech, showing the Apple II graphic and sound capabilities in a decent arcade game. Enjoy it in Full HD quality 60p.

Presented by http://hirudov.com
